Text: Energy Auction Place February th Oil Gas Property AuctionwwwEnergyAuctionPlacecom the online oil gas property auction Place your properties for sale at our February th auction We are seeking Royalty and Overriding Royalty Interests Both Operated and Nonoperated Working Interests Undeveloped Acreage We offer a Extremely low cost You pay Only of the cash sales price b No risk selling opportunity You only pay when you sell and you set your minimum sale price c Exposure prospective buyers see your sales notice d Your property data available online at no charge e We have sold all types of properties in as little as three weeks To sell a property call up our site at wwwenergyauctionplacecom and click on SELLER SIGNUP Complete the short request form and we will send you a sales information packet There is no charge to sign up as a buyer Just call up our site and click on BUYER SIGNUP and we will send you our buyer agreement in a few minutes by autofax Best wishes for the HOLIDAY SEASON John R Bower Energy Auction Place LLC This is not an offer to buy or sell securities in any state where prohibited by law andor Neidiger Tucker Bruner Inc and its representatives are not registered Securities Services Provided by Neidiger Tucker Bruner Inc Member NASDSIPC Larimer Street Suite Denver Colorado
